channel.title: Social Media on Kacper Krasowski
channel.description: Recent content in Social Media on Kacper Krasowski

item.title: Social Media and Labor Market outcomes. An analysis of Facebook effect on college graduates earnings
item.description: Quasi-experimental evidence on the effect of Facebook exposure during college on graduates’ earnings.

item.title: Impact of Censorship in Social Media
item.description: A model of censorship in social networks using Friedkin–Johnsen opinion dynamics, with implications for polarization, disagreement, and welfare.
